message.name: PROTOCOL_CHEAT
message.value: Ban for attempting to hack game protocol

message.name: BATTLE_CANCEL
message.value: Ban for the use of programs and bugs causing cancellation of combat

message.value: Ban for using software to search friends

message.value: Ban for breaking the game shop

message.name: BAN_FOR_CHAT
message.value: Ban for the insulting other players

message.name: HELP_FOR_BAN
message.value: You can send a request to remove the ban to
